pages.text: Used to infuse yourself, mobs, or other players with potion effects. Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to toggle automatic infusion, which regularly infuses you with small doses. It can be filled with $(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)potion fluid$(/l) and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: Potion Infuser
pages.text: It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve fluid capacity.
